name: Cryptid Clash
body: Defeat Mothman using Bigfoot in single player
author: Minvis#8969

name: The Adventure Begins
body: Win a game of UMA
author: Minvis#8969

name: Minvis’ Challenge
body: Win a game against the Martian invader, all 6 minions, and four random Events.
author: Minvis#8969

name: The Ultimate Challenge
body: Win a game against the Mothman, 6 minions and all the events
author: Minvis#8969

name: The Most Ultimate Challenge
body: With a single character, win a game against the Mothman, 6 minions and all the events
author: Minvis#8969

name: We Brought a Zoo
body: Deal 20 damage with Infinite Strikes in a single turn.
author: Minvis#8969

name: Prehistoric Terror
body: Defeat the Martian Invader using the T-Rex
author: Minvis#8969

name: One Hit
body: Defeat a villain with a single attack
author: Minvis#8969

name: Tales to Amaze
body: Win a game against either Mothman or the Martian Invader using Tesla, Jill Trent, Golden Bat, and Annie Christmas.
author: Minvis#8969

name: The Originals
body: Win with Medusa, Sinbad, Alice and King Arthur.
author: Minvis#8969

name: Nightmare Scenario
body: Win a game against Mothman, Jersey Devil, Ant Queen, Loveland frog and the Blob.
author: Minvis#8969

name: Consultation Prize
body: Lose a UMA game
author: Minvis#8969

name: Friends
body: Play a game of unmatched with four players
author: Minvis#8969

name: On My Own
body: Win a single player game of UMA
author: Minvis#8969

name: The Creators
body: Play a game of UMA with one of the designers or a member of Restoration Games staff
author: Minvis#8969

name: The Spice of Life
body: Win UMA with every currently released character at least once.
author: Minvis#8969

name: Fatal Struggle
body: Win with one character left with 1 Health
author: Minvis#8969

name: FANtasy to reality
body: Win a game of UMA with Genie and Houdini
author: Minvis#8969

name: Secret Mission
body: As Black Widow, damage at least five enemies at once with “The Firenze Agenda”
author: Minvis#8969

name: Beast Mode
body: Deal ten or more damage to a boss using “Beastform”
author: Minvis#8969

name: Hyde
body: Deal 20 or more damage to a boss using “Forever Hyde”
author: Minvis#8969

name: I've hunted most things that can hunt you
body: Have Muldoon (not INGEN workers) deal the killing blow to each villain and minion at least once.
author: Minvis#8969

name: Leave our food alone
body: Win a game with Angel, Spike and Dracula
author: Minvis#8969

name: Blitzkrieg
body: Win with all 6 minions without defeating a minion?
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: Skirmisher
body: Win but never end your turn adjacent to the villain
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: To the Bitter End
body: Win with 2+ players, each with exactly 0 cards remaining in their deck
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: Defenders of New York
body: Win against all 6 minions with Daredevil, Moon Knight, Spider-Man, and Luke Cage
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: Back to Basics
body: Win against Mothman with King Arthur, Alice, Sinbad, and Medusa
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: Time in a Bottle
body: Win with all fighters occupying their starting space at the end of the match
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: Dominoes
body: You must defeat each minion individually before you can deal damage to another, or the villain.
author: Snowjedi6#3542

name: Started from the bottom, now we’re here.
body: Win an Unmatched Adventures match as each of the Buffy set characters
author: NHydraLutris#8999

name: With Great Power…
body: Beat a villain as any marvel character
author: NHydraLutris#8999

name: The Tables Have Turned
body: Win Tales to Amaze with as many or more heroes in play as there are enemies (currently requires Raptors or C&D)
author: Aerodyth#9473

name: On the Road Again (or something movement related):
body: Win with Invisible Man, Ghost Rider, Sinbad, and Houdini
author: Aerodyth#9473

name: Secret Mission
body: As Black Widow, damage five enemies at once with The Firenze Agenda
author: littleexpressionlessanimal#7443

name: ALIEN STUDIES
body: Win a game against Martian Invader with all players playing as Tesla, Jekyll/Hyde, Sherlock, and Dr. Sattler. (4 player Achievement)
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: MONSTER SLAYER
body: Defeat all Minions on the board before Mothman is defeated
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: NO COLATERAL DAMAGE
body: Win a game against Mothman without a single bridge being destroyed
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: DOWN TO THE WIRE
body: Win a game of UMA with the Threat Tracker being one away from the Villain winning
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: BITTER SWEET END
body: Win a game of UMA with your hero being the last friendly fighter standing.
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: JUST AS BIG
body: Defeat a Villain using Big Alice
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: QUARRELS WITH SQUIRRELS
body: Defeat 20 minions with only Squirrel Girl's Squirrels
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: SCALEY FACTOR
body: Have each Raptor defeat a Villain or a Minion
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516

name: HELPING HAND
body: Defeat a Minion or Villain who delt damage to an undefeated friendly fighter right before your turn started.
author: SoldierB_Toasty#6516
